name: WB-Mining
description: The world's first crypto project to mine real gold on the "Lucky Me" gold claim in the Yukon Canada and sell 15% of all profits to buy back and burn WBM tokens. It is a unique mix of gold rush, crypto, nft and mobile gaming! The gold mining company "Double U-B Mining LCC" has various sources of income and has decided to use a part of all incomes for the periodic buyback & burn events. From now on, a monthly report on the income is drawn up and buyback & burn events are carried out. WB-Mining is a pioneer project and a milestone in entertainment culture. The $WBM tokens are limited to 18 million and are heavily deflationary.
